sentences.en: "Drive safely," he said and waved goodbye.
All 140 guests were brought out of the building safely by firemen.
sentences.cn: 消防队员把140名客人全部从大楼里安全营救出来。

sentences.en: Captain Cook safely navigated his ship without accident for 100 voyages.
sentences.cn: 库克船长驾驶的船安全出航100次无事故。

sentences.en: He learned to walk safely up and down stairs.
sentences.cn: 他学会了安全地上下楼梯。

sentences.en: I think we can safely assume that she will pass the exam.
sentences.cn: 我想我们可以确信她会通过考试。

sentences.en: I think we can safely dismiss their objections.
sentences.cn: 我认为我们对他们的异议完全可以不予理会。

sentences.en: I was thankful to see they'd all arrived safely.
sentences.cn: 看到他们都平安到达，我感到欣慰。

sentences.en: She nestled the eggs safely in the straw in Jim's basket.
sentences.cn: 她把鸡蛋轻轻地放在吉姆篮子里的稻草上。

sentences.en: The banker keeps the money tucked safely under his bed.
sentences.cn: 这位银行家为保险起见将钱塞在床下。

sentences.en: The night shift should have been safely down the mine long ago.
sentences.cn: 上夜班的矿工应该早就安全地到达井下了。
飞行员安全地跳伞逃生。

sentences.en: The waste is safely locked away until it is no longer radioactive.
sentences.cn: 废料被安全储存起来，直到其不再有辐射性。

sentences.en: Traders generally travel safely through the border.
sentences.cn: 商人通常可以安全通过边界。

sentences.en: We can build up the speed gradually and safely.
sentences.cn: 我们可以逐渐稳妥地提高速度。

words.tran_cn: 安全；保险；安全设备；保险装置；安打

trans.tran_cn: 安全地，未受损伤/损坏，有把握地，安稳地
trans.tran_en: in a way that is safe
